title: Prestige TV Pod: 'The Morning Show' S2E1 Recap
description:
Bill Simmons and Amanda Dobbins discuss the newest season of 'The Morning Show' on Apple TV+ and how this season might be even more perplexing than the last.
Hosts: Bill Simmons and Amanda Dobbins
Producer: Steven Ahlman
